content.newsInsight: China just purged more nuclear force commanders and everyone's focused on Xi's paranoia. Wrong lens. When you clean house in your nuclear command while ramping military drills, you're not scared. You're synchronizing clocks for something bigger.
content.patternInsight: You're still reading. That already puts you ahead.
content.intelligenceExample: China's military purges, for example. We read that and our mind goes to: if you're purging nuclear commanders while increasing Taiwan drills, are you eliminating hesitation or creating it?
